name: Fresh Tomato Juice
keywords: celery, garlic, red onion, serrano chili, tomato, summer
recipeIngredient: 5 pounds very ripe tomatoes, cored and cut in eighths
1 or 2 Serrano or other hot chilis

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients except salt and sugar in a large pot. Cover and simmer for about 30 minutes, until the tomatoes have fallen apart. Let cool for 15 minutes.
Discard the celery, peppers and parsley. Force the rest of the mixture through a sieve or food mill. Discard the solids and chill the juice.
Season with a teaspoon of salt, or to taste, and up to 1/2 teaspoon of sugar. Refrigerate. Use within a few days.
